Uses of Class
edu.rit.pj2.ParallelStatement

  • Packages that use ParallelStatement 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2
    Package edu.rit.pj2 contains Parallel Java 2 (PJ2), an API and middleware for parallel programming in 100% Java on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, supercomputing grids, and cloud computing services.

    • Uses of ParallelStatement in edu.rit.pj2

      Subclasses of ParallelStatement in edu.rit.pj2 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IntParallelForLoop
      Class IntParallelForLoop provides a work sharing parallel for loop executed by multiple threads, with a loop index of type int.
      class  LongParallelForLoop
      Class LongParallelForLoop provides a work sharing parallel for loop executed by multiple threads, with a loop index of type long.
      class  ObjectParallelForLoop<W>
      Class ObjectParallelForLoop provides a work sharing parallel for loop executed by multiple threads, looping over the work items in a WorkQueue.
      class  ParallelForLoop
      Class ParallelForLoop is the abstract base class for a work sharing parallel for loop executed by multiple threads.
      class  WorkerParallelForLoop
      Class WorkerParallelForLoop provides the worker portion of a master-worker cluster parallel for loop.
